text: Anselmo Marzato, O.F.M. Cap. (1543–1607) was a Roman Catholic cardinal. ==Biography== On 24 Feb 1607, he was consecrated bishop Pope Paul V, with Ludovico de Torres, Archbishop of Monreale, with Marcello Lante della Rovere, Bishop of Todi, serving as co-consecrators. ==References== Category:1543 births Category:1607 deaths Category:People from Monopoli Category:Cardinals (Catholic Church) Category:Capuchin bishops
title: Anselmo Marzato
